articles.description: Joe Root's flawless hundred in the fourth Test against India proves that he and England can adapt their methods, writes Stephan Shemilt.
articles.title: Root rules Ranchi to show England's adaptability

articles.description: Liverpool will aim to stay on course for a quadruple in Sunday's Carabao Cup final, while Chelsea bid for their first domestic trophy in six years.
articles.title: 'We'll go for it' - Liverpool aim to complete first leg of quadruple

articles.description: Liverpool will play Sparta Prague in the Europa League last 16, while Brighton face Roma and Rangers will take on Benfica.
articles.title: Liverpool meet Sparta Prague in Europe, Brighton get Roma

articles.description: Thomas Tuchel says he does not think he is "the only problem" at Bayern Munich and believes he can afford to be "more reckless" before leaving at the end of the season.
articles.title: I'm not only problem at Bayern - departing Tuchel

articles.description: Ugo Monye says England's decision to start George Furbank at full-back is an "attack-minded selection" but "very unlike Steve Borthwick".
articles.title: Furbank selection 'very unlike Borthwick' - Monye

articles.description: Manchester United are expected to be without striker Rasmus Hojlund for two to three weeks because of a muscle injury.
articles.title: Man Utd striker Hojlund out with muscle injury

articles.description: David Moyes says he has been offered a new contract to stay on as West Ham manager but will wait to make a decision on his future at the end of the season.
articles.title: Moyes to decide on West Ham future at end of season

articles.description: Georgia Ball's video of a man offering unsolicited advice has been watched more than 10 million times.
articles.title: Mansplaining: Golf pro Georgia Ball says viral TikTok reaction 'crazy'

articles.description: The Court of Arbitration for Sport dismisses Russia's appeal against the International Olympic Committee's decision to suspend its membership.
articles.title: Russia's appeal against suspension by International Olympic Committee dismissed

articles.description: Valencia's La Liga match against Granada is postponed after ten people die in a deadly city fire.
articles.title: Valencia game called off after deadly fire in city
